author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...ANDREA BECOMES A REMNANT LOW... ...THIS IS THE FINAL ADVISORY...
summary: ...ANDREA BECOMES A REMNANT LOW... ...THIS IS THE FINAL ADVISORY... As of 11:00 PM AST Tue Jun 24 the center of Andrea was located near 38.7, -45.2 with movement ENE at 20 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1015 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...ANDREA BECOMES A REMNANT LOW... ...THIS IS THE FINAL ADVISORY... As of 11:00 PM AST Tue Jun 24 the center of Andrea was located near 38.7, -45.2 with movement ENE at 20 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1015 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

title: Summary for Post-Tropical Cyclone Andrea (AT1/AL012025)
